subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Oct. 7 (AP) — The Formula One season will come down to the final race with three drivers chasing the title. Lewis Hamilton missed his chance to clinch by gambling on one lap too many on bad tires.
snippet: SHANGHAI, Oct. 7 (AP) — The Formula One season will come down to the final race with three drivers chasing the title. Lewis Hamilton missed his chance to clinch by gambling on one lap too many on bad tires.
